To those who want to play this game or any game early all you have to do is play it offline which means no internet connection to the microsoft servers thats it and when you finish the game uninstall it and clear your cache on ur hardrive just to be on the safe side,then when its released you can connect to xboxlive and play the mulitplayer etc good luck all :)
